name: Lumin (Stellar Echo)
description:
Play as a traveler with no memory, no story, prophesized to save the world through the power of three fountains that power the life on earth. Three endings, multiple different ways to play and develop the story. Enjoy!

Note: This is my first attempt at an adventure RPG, and given my limited knowledge of game making I used a lot, like a LOT, of pre-made assets.  There are also probably quite a few bugs, typos, etc. as it's not completely done yet.
